description:
The Revolution finally reaches its final phase; Night Raid is en route to assassinate Minister Onest, the root of the problem.  All goes according to Najenda’s plan as the Revolutionary Army successfully invades the city.  Night Raid arrives at the Palace where the Emperor and Minister are located.  Unlike the panicked Emperor, the Minister is composed and confident as they prepare to unleash their trump card.  As the palace trembles, something appears from below...!
Source: crunchyroll
